title: Ep 164: Just What the Doctor Ordered with Dr. Alex Anderson
itunes:title: Ep 164: Just What the Doctor Ordered with Dr. Alex Anderson
itunes:subtitle: Kate reserves the “fancy sunscreen” for herself and Doree starts to tickle the ivories. Then, friend of the pod, Dr. Alex Anderson joins the show to talk about a day in the life of an Anesthesiology Specialist, wanting more steps in her skincare routin...
description:
Kate reserves the “fancy sunscreen” for herself and Doree starts to tickle the ivories. Then, friend of the pod, Dr. Alex Anderson joins the show to talk about a day in the life of an Anesthesiology Specialist, wanting more steps in her skincare routine, and what it’s like to go grey gracefully.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
